text: ScratchJr is a visual programming language designed to introduce programming skills to children aged 5 to 7 years old. The app is considered an introductory programming language.ScratchJr coding-for-kids project hits $25k Kickstarter goal in two days, The Guardian, 24 March 2014 It is available for free to iOS, Android and Chromebook. ScratchJr is a coding language modeled after Scratch, which is used by over 10 million people worldwide. Programming in Scratch requires basic reading skills, so the creators saw a need for another programming language which would provide a easier way to learn programming at a younger age and without any reading or math needed to understand it. == References == Category:Programming languages
title: ScratchJr
